title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 6.2 - Nonresidents
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 6.2 - Nonresidents

State Regulations

Residents of other states may be admitted by special
appointment of the commissioner, and shall pay in advance to the department a
tuition fee fixed by the commissioner by regulation. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
6.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
